title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Web-Based Multimedia Grammar Learning Design: Application of Mathematical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain mathematical grammar terms (e.g., equations, functional relationships) with 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance their ability to apply mathematical concepts through interactive practice exercises (fill-in-the-blank, drag-and-drop).
Learners can interpret complex mathematical concepts into a hierarchical structure of three or more levels using multimedia resources (audio/visual materials).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
